about.summary: In this implementation of the Naive Bayes classifier following class conditional distributions are available: Bernoulli, Categorical, Gaussian, Poisson and non-parametric representation of the class conditional density estimated via Kernel Density Estimation.

In this implementation of the Naive Bayes classifier following class conditional distributions are available: Bernoulli, Categorical, Gaussian, Poisson and non-parametric representation of the class conditional density estimated via Kernel Density Estimation.

name: r-naivebayes
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.9.7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-naivebayes
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/naivebayes_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/naivebayes/naivebayes_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4fe9e5e947faaa3cbec14ae3db1cb6dfbf90e0dee89975d5727869881a3a151c

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 3
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('naivebayes')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('naivebayes')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/majkamichal/naivebayes, https://majkamichal.github.io/naivebayes/
  license: GPL-2
  summary: 'In this implementation of the Naive Bayes classifier following class conditional distributions are available: Bernoulli, Categorical, Gaussian, Poisson
    and non-parametric representation of the class conditional density estimated via Kernel Density Estimation.'
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: naivebayes
# Type: Package
# Title: High Performance Implementation of the Naive Bayes Algorithm
# Version: 0.9.6
# Author: Michal Majka
# Maintainer: Michal Majka <michalmajka@hotmail.com>
# Description: In this implementation of the Naive Bayes classifier following class conditional distributions are available: Bernoulli, Categorical, Gaussian, Poisson and non-parametric representation of the class conditional density estimated via Kernel Density Estimation.
# URL: https://github.com/majkamichal/naivebayes, https://majkamichal.github.io/naivebayes/
# BugReports: https://github.com/majkamichal/naivebayes/issues
# License: GPL-2
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Suggests: knitr
# Packaged: 2019-06-03 21:21:36 UTC; Michal
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-06-03 21:40:03 UTC
